title: Enhancing Customer Experience Competencies: VR-Based Karate Basic Techniques Learning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Karate Terminology and Fundamental Etiquette Understanding
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can perform three basic karate kicks (front kick, side kick) at precise angles (45–90 degrees) via VR simulation.
Learners replicate five fundamental defensive movements (e.g., upper block, downward block) with over 80% accuracy in a virtual reality environment.
Learners correct their movement errors within three attempts using a VR-based feedback system.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
